jde.util
Class DynamicClassLoader

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.ClassLoader
      jde.util.DynamicClassLoader

public class DynamicClassLoader
extends java.lang.ClassLoader

The class DynamicClassLoader extends the abstract class ClassLoader. This class loads the class binaries from the file system all the time, it does not catch the class information. There is caveat to this, classes that come with the JDK such as java.lang.*, are loaded using the standard class loader. The rest of the class are always reloaded from the file system. Created: Sun Jul 01 08:11:12 2001

Since:
jde2.2.8beta2
Version:
1.0
Author:

Method Detail

loadClass

public java.lang.Class loadClass(java.lang.String argClassName)
                          throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
Loads a class information from the file system, if it fails it tries Class.forName(argClassName)

Overrides:
loadClass in class java.lang.ClassLoader
Parameters:
argClassName - name of the class to be loaded.
Returns:
Class of the type argClassName
Throws:
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if the class cannot be found.
